channel.title: Blogs on Srinivas Raghav V C

item.title: Inventory Management System for Kirana Stores
item.description: A tailored inventory management system for small-scale retailers, improving operational efficiency by 25%.

item.title: MNIST Digit Recognition
item.description: A web application for digit recognition using the MNIST dataset, achieving 98% accuracy.

item.title: Mandelbrot Set Visualization
item.description: A high-performance visualization of the Mandelbrot Set, enabling users to explore intricate fractal patterns effortlessly.

item.title: Gravity Simulation
item.description: A physics-based simulation of gravitational interactions using C++, providing an interactive learning experience.

item.title: Maze Solver using BFS
item.description: A maze-solving algorithm based on Breadth-First Search (BFS) to find the shortest path through complex mazes.
